title: Age case: Lockheed must pay $51M to laid-off Penn Valley engineer
text:
Age case: Lockheed must pay $51M to laid-off Penn Valley engineer Updated: January 27, 2017 â€” 7:18 PM EST 132 Share 
Lockheed's lawyers in New York and Newark, N.J., and its representatives at its headquarters in Bethesda, Md., did not return calls seeking comment. A message left for Braden at his home was not returned.
